input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Catherine: this party rocks!
Jennifer: you said it. Good beer, good music, and on top of that, there are so many hot girls here!
Catherine: I'm with you on that. Check out that one over there. I think I'm in love!
Jennifer: well, she's alright, but not really my cup of tea. What about the blond with the red dress?
Catherine: oh, that's Janice. She's just new in town. You have a thing for blonds, eh?
Jennifer: yeah! She could do anything she wants to me!
Catherine: I bet. Why not go over and talk to her? She's really nice.
Jennifer: I don't think so. I get so nervous talking to girls. I always put my foot in my mouth, scare her off, and end up looking like a real fool. Besides, she is way out of my league.
Catherine: come on! Man up! You'll never know until you try.
Jennifer: okay okay, just let me have another cup of beers to get my head in the game.
Catherine: all right. But I think you ought to move soon.
Jennifer: why?
Catherine: I can see five other guys eying her up.
Jennifer: okay, here I go!
Catherine: good luck!

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Catherine and Jennifer are at a party. They both think the girls are hot. Jennifer likes the blond girl in the red dress. Catherine convinces Jennifer to talk to her. Jennifer is nervous, but Catherine thinks she is way out of Jennifer's league.
input_text.Response B: Catherine and Jennifer are at a nice party. Jennifer has a crush on Janice but is afraid of talking to her. Catherine wishes Jennifer good luck.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is incorrect as Catherine doesn't think the girl is out of Jennifer's league.
